messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] haircut
messages.msgSnippet: ***You cut your hair right before the conference? How will I know you???! *** Why, by my sparkling wit, of course.  I cut my looooong hair in May and
messages.messageBody:
***You cut your hair right before the conference?

How will I know you???! <G>***

Why, by my sparkling wit, of course. <g>

I cut my looooong hair in May and then last week when my sil was here we
were drinking a nice Shiraz and before I knew it, my hair was shorter.
I shouldn't have short hair, but these are the things you just don't know
until it's too late. <g>


Deb

messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] haircut
